title: Status jumping
excerpt: It’s pretty easy to feel like you don’t have enough by comparing yourself to people to have more than you.

children.text: It’s pretty easy to feel like you don’t have enough by comparing yourself to people to have more than you.
Reason enough to proactively find ways to ignore the temptation to discover more of what you could have.
And to repeatedly acknowledge what you've already got (compared to those who have much less).
